type.heading: Type
type.text: The type parameter is meant to be seen as sort of severity indicator. It's value either success, info, warning or danger.

icon.heading: Icon
icon.text: The icon parameter is an array that can configured just as the icon component. It could also be left out completely.

title.heading: Title
title.text: The title to show above the message

messageSize.heading: Message size
messageSize.text: The size of the message can be set to either sm, md or lg and will also affect the icon since our icon package is a font.
